details.sectionContent: This event will test the mental ability and technical knowledge of the participants.
The event is based on the technical ability and programming ability.

‣	This round will test the mental ability of the participants.

‣	In this participant have to identify images and answer the questions.

‣	Judging criteria will be based on the number of correct answers.

‣	In this round the participants will be in a team of 4 members.

‣	Every member will be given an application in which they will have to solve riddles and unlock a piece of puzzle.Like this every member will unlock a piece of puzzle and hence the whole puzzle should be completed.

‣	Judgement will be based on the least time taken to complete the round.

‣	This round is played in the group of 2 people.

‣	In this 1 of the team members is on computer and another one has a riddle to solve, He/she have to solve that riddle and pass that answer to another team member without speaking anything  or by doing any sign with hand. He/she just have pass that answer by just doing lip sync and after that if member that are sitting on computer identify answer then he/she have to solve error which is in program.

‣	Judging criteria is based on the given time limit and riddle and error you have solved.
